pages.text: Aulacoceras is genus of Triassic aulacocerid belemnoid. Although aulacocerids are more basal than belemnites, their shell morphology looks relatively similar. However, their fossils lack calcite, which can be seen in belemnite fossils.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Kill for Egg
